General.Name: Beingmate Baby & Child Food Co Ltd
General.Description: Beingmate Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells children's food and nutritious food products in China. It provides baby food, milk powder for children, and other food products for pregnant women and infants, as well as provides related consulting services. The company was formerly known as Beingmate Baby & Child Food Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beingmate Co., Ltd. in October 2019. Beingmate Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1999 is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
